name: Capitalism Lab
summary: Capitalism Lab is the latest version in the Capitalism business simulation game series. It lets you build the business empire of your dream. You become a corporate CEO and face real-world challenges as you build a sprawling business empire covering retailing, manufacturing, agricultural business, mining, real estate, media and stock trading! Capitalism Lab improves upon the award-winning Capitalism II with a host of new features and improvements, including new products, realistic simulation of inflation (the first of its kind), greatly enhanced macroeconomic simulation, the ability to build community, sport facilities, and media firms, as well as improved screen resolutions, interfaces, smarter AI, and many other improvements!
